internalDatabase.query:
-- Enable extension
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pgcrypto;

-- Create table with all columns, including composite_id, first
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}" (
    field_id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    flow_name TEXT,
    tenant_id TEXT,
    log_message TEXT,
    --other fields to follow 
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Create the last_execution_of_flows if not yet existings
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS last_execution_of_flows(
    flow_key TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    tenant_id TEXT,
    flow TEXT,
    trigger_type TEXT,
    last_execution TIMESTAMP
);
SELECT (last_execution) FROM last_execution_of_flows WHERE tenant_id = '{{data.var.tenantId}}' AND flow='{{data.var.flowName}}'

internalDatabase.query:
INSERT INTO "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}" (
    flow_name,
    tenant_id,    
    log_message,
    created_at,
    updated_at
) 
VALUES (?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
